trends: There has been one other sighting in Fort Mohave
There were no other sightings in Fort Mohave on or around February 28th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWas sitting in jacuzzi @ 7:49 pm & was watching the stars when this ufo turned on the outer lights. They came on like real dim & then they went off. This only took a few seconds to transpire. Then it was gone. The ufo was only about 700 feet above the house. The ufo was headed toward Kingman,Az
Summary: UFO above house & turned on outer lights
